mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content,LECTURE_REVIEW.regdate, profile, starRating FROM LECTURE_REVIEW INNER JOIN users ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_REVIEW (num, writer, content, starRating ,regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{starRating}, SYSDATE)
